Gold.en: Fires three kinds of beams at once.

Silver.en: Fires three kinds of beams at once.

Crystal.en: Fires three kinds of beams at once.

Ruby.en: Fires three types of beams at the same time.
Ruby.de: Feuert 3 Arten von Strahlen gleichzeitig ab.

Sapphire.en: Fires three types of beams at the same time.
Sapphire.de: Feuert 3 Arten von Strahlen gleichzeitig ab.

Emerald.en: Fires three types of beams at the same time.
Emerald.de: Feuert 3 Arten von Strahlen gleichzeitig ab.

FireRed.en: A simultaneous 3-beam attack that may paralyze, burn, or freeze the foe.
FireRed.de: Feuert 3 Arten von Strahlen ab. Evtl. Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Frost.

LeafGreen.en: A simultaneous 3-beam attack that may paralyze, burn, or freeze the foe.
LeafGreen.de: Feuert 3 Arten von Strahlen ab. Evtl. Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Frost.

Diamond.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
Diamond.de: Feuert Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Pearl.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
Pearl.de: Feuert Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Platinum.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
Platinum.de: Feuert Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

HeartGold.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
HeartGold.de: Feuert Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

SoulSilver.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
SoulSilver.de: Feuert Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Black.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
Black.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

White.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
White.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Black_2.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

White_2.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
White_2.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

X.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
X.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Y.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.
Y.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

O.Ruby.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

A.Sapphire.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

Sun.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
Sun.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Moon.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
Moon.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Ultra_Sun.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
Ultra_Sun.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.

Ultra_Moon.en: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
Ultra_Moon.de: Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung oder Einfrieren.
